channel.title: DL on Woffee's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in DL on Woffee's Blog

item.title: DeepVD: Toward Class-Separation Features for Neural Network Vulnerability Detection
item.description: The advances of machine learning (ML) including deep learning (DL) have enabled several approaches to implicitly learn vulnerable code patterns to automatically detect software vulnerabilities.

item.title: QA4GIS: A novel approach learning to answer GIS developer questions with API documentation
item.description: Community-based question answering websites have attracted more and more scholars and developers to discuss domain knowledge and software development.
